index-introduce: Web and mobile changes rapidly, and new knowledge to acquire seems to increase exponentially. It has become more important to select essential technologies among numerous fields.^ My interest is to easily modularize and reuse CI/CD technology related to MERN stack, npm module or docker-compose, etc.
index-head: A sample that isolates reusable modules from the project output. It is a mixture of npm published and cloned from github.
interest-sub: What I am usually using or interested
index-interest: All technologies necessary for MERN stack development. Development-related technologies such as Documentation, S3 file server, and DevOps-related technologies such as Docker and CI/CD
about-body: Hi, this is Young Nam, over 10 year experienced freelance web and mobile programmer.^My skill is focused on MERN statck, good at Nodejs, React, MongoDB, Mysql. Also DevOps related fileds - Docker , CI/CD, and git etc..^I graduaged from computer science, Korea National Open University. I can communicate in English and Korean.^I prefer working part-time, or on a project basis.
